posts.post_content:
Hi. PM me if you have a PSA or SGC-graded Addie Joss T205 card for sale. Thanks.
[IMG]http://cdn2-b.examiner.com/sites/default/files/styles/large/hash/95/60/9560b69b3bc2ce8301b2c702908af640.jpg[/IMG]

There is a 1.5 on Ebay that is not terrible.  It is priced at $500 but the buyer indicated some flexibility.  It is a pretty nice looking card if you have centering tollerance. I ended up finding a skin that will do for now, but I am certainly looking to upgrade.  A 4 changed hands at Chantilly, I think at $1200.  It was a nice looking one.

Thanks. I have seen the T205 Joss on eBay, but I don't want to shell out that much money for a 1.5. I realize that it is a rare card, but a low-grade version won't increase in value and might even lose value.
